headline: General Dynamics Balances Record Backlog Navy Win And Gulfstream Tensions
summary: General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) secured a nearly $1b contract to modernize US Navy fleet systems, adding to its existing government work. The company reported record order backlog and record earnings alongside the new contract award. At the same time, its Gulfstream jet division is caught in a regulatory dispute between the US and Canada, involving threatened tariffs and certification questions. General Dynamics, trading at $351.09, sits at the intersection of defense, IT services, and business...
